title: WeWork plans Nasdaq listing, curbs CEO's voting power
text:
WeWork plans Nasdaq listing, curbs CEO's voting power

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 06:51AM ET)

(Reuters) - WeWork owner The We Company said on Friday it plans to list its stock on the Nasdaq and announced changes to its corporate governance, including curbs in the voting power of founder and CEO Adam Neumann, ahead of the roadshow for its stock market launch. WeWork also said no member of Neumann's family will be on the company's board and any future successor will be selected collectively by the board.

WeWork plans Nasdaq listing, curbs CEO's voting power
description: WeWork plans Nasdaq listing, curbs CEO's voting power
